alert.note: Alert for Cobb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cobb and central Fulton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Fair Oaks, or over Marietta, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Kennesaw, Powder Springs, Austell, Fair Oaks, White Water Park, Lost Mountain Park, Vinings, Jim R Miller Park, Six Flags Over Georgia, Bolton, Dobbins Air Reserve Base, Mableton, Chastain Memorial Park, and Due West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
